text: wastmru- 'ayuha almwmnwn- fi 'iinfaq al'amwal lnsrt din allah teala, waljhad fi sbylh, wala tawaqaeuu 'anfusakum fi almhalk bitark aljhad fi sabil allh, wedm al'iinfaq fyh, wa'ahsanuu fi al'iinfaq waltaet, wajealuu eamalukum klh khalsana liwajh allah teala. 'iina allah yuhibu 'ahl al'iikhlas wal'ihsan
